This is the plot: - Dominion Voting Systems files defamation lawsuit against Fox News, claiming 20 specific broadcasts and tweets spread lies and damaged reputation
- Allegations include election fraud, algorithm flips, ties to Venezuela, and politicians receiving kickbacks
- Judge has ruled that these allegations are false
- Trial will determine if statements were made with "actual malice"
- Dominion seeks $1.6 billion in damages, Fox denies wrongdoing
- Specific broadcasts involve interviews with Sidney Powell, Rudy Giuliani, and Mike Lindell"
